page.title: 04ENTERTAINMENT.
page.content: There is a lot of entertainment in Ilfracombe.86% of Ilfracombe's population prefer outdoor sports and activities like Crazy Golf,Putting, Sport Canoes,Swimming and Sunbathing. Other people enjoy indoor activities like Art Exhibitions, Museum, Cinema & Indoor Skating Centre.Most of these entertainments are placed around the High St.,Wilder Rd.,and the Promenade. There is one Cinema in Ilfracombe called The Embassy.It provides modern films.The Tourist Information Centre gives details about these places.The Pavilion Theatre offers entertainment for the family.This summer the show is called Carson's Capers starring Frank Carson.There are many restaurants in the area and the local speciality is fish and chips.Cheap food is easily found.Many young people entertain themselves in the Amusement Arcades.
